short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to submit feedback from any webpage to the Productmotion Feedback Inbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The conversations sales, marketing, support, and other teams are having on a daily basis in various platforms are a wealth of information that can help drive forward product strategy and uncover deep insights into what to focus a product teamâ€™s efforts on next.

This extension allows you to easily submit feedback from any webpage to the Productmotion Feedback Inbox. You will then be able to use Productmotion's myriad of tools to organize, triage, and extract important insights. These valuable insights can then be used to help your product team prioritize what to do next, and most importantly - help answer not just the what, but the why?
